name: A Jedi's Cunning
Lore: 'Luke''s sudden reversal of fortune allowed him to turn the tables on Vader.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  While Sidious or an [Episode I] hologram on table, opponent may not cancel immunity to attrition of your Jedi and draws no more than two battle destiny at sites where you have a Jedi.  Opponent draws no more than two battle destiny where Luke present. (Immune to Alter.)',
